messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I have been kidnapped, and we are being followed.
He's going to kill me if they keep following him.
Okay, and what's your name, ma'am?
Okay.
Are you in the car with him?
He has me in the back.
He has a guy, and he's got a nine-millimeter.
Do you have any other weapons in there?
Yes.
Do you know what kind of weapons he has?
I think he has two others. He's got a rifle.
Okay, and what else?
He says that he's taking me home. He said if they try to stop him before then, I'm going to get hurt.
Are you able to put him on the phone?
Can I talk to him for a second?
Ma'am?
Get them off my ass.
Hey.
They can follow me at a distance. I will drive around 80 or 90, safely. She is going home.
Sir, why don't you just pull over so we can end this peacefully?
That's not going to happen. Maybe you didn't hear me. Back them up or I start opening fire.
Sir, why are you running?
You're risking this woman's life. We're heading south. You've got three officers ganging up on me right now, and I have enough ammunition to kill her and myself.
Get out of my ass now! They are more than welcome to follow me at a distance. If they continue to do this, people are going to get hurt.
If the officer following me does not break off pursuit, then people will be hurt.
Where are you located?
I don't even know what officer's following you.
Can you let me know where you are so I can let the officer know?
We're going south on I-95. If they continue to follow me, I will fire a warning shot. The third shot will not be a warning.
Do you have a weapon on you?
You guys don't seem to want to believe me.
I'm just asking you a question. What kind of gun do you have?
I am going to take this young lady back to her home. You will not interfere. Is that understood?
So you're going where?
They are welcome to follow me at a distance, but I'm not telling you where. You understand?
I don't really understand the situation that's going on.
You don't need to. Either the police stay off of my ass and they stay well back, or I'm going to hurt people.
Okay, good deal.
